column5: a container truck full of cigarettes was stopped.------Customs authorities searched the container truck on National Highway 4
column6: cracking down on smuggling and seized 1
column7: 160 cartons of cigarettes.------Authorities confirmed that all cigarettes had no stamps
column9: import duties or other relevant documents of customs rules.  The evidence was kept at customs offices.------A Chinese smuggling ring is reported to be behind the operation. ------AREY
